text: Maria Jesus Contreras (born 1993) is a Chilean illustrator and graphic designer. == Early life and career == Contreras was raised in Temuco, Chile. She studied graphic design at the Pontificia Universidad Cat√≥lica de Chile. She has contributed to numerous international media outlets, including The New York Times, New York Magazine, The New Yorker, Berliner Zeitung, the Los Angeles Times, The Atlantic, and Texas Monthly. In 2022, Contreras was awarded YoungGuns International Award Winner. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean artists Category:Illustrators
title: Maria Jesus Contreras
